data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Kristiyan Malinov (Oud-Heverlee) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 35, Nany Dimata for Anderlecht has been booked by Bram Van Driessche and receives a first yellow card.
Yari Verschaeren puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Michael Murillo with an assist there.
The first-half has come to a close in Brussels.
In the minute 45, Percy Tau heads in to give Anderlecht a 2-0 lead at Lotto Park.
That's a fine assist from Bogdan Mykhaylichenko.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Goal! Frederic Duplus pulls one back for Oud-Heverlee to make it 2-1.
Sascha Kotysch (Oud-Heverlee) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 65, Marc Brys is making the team's first substitution at Lotto Park with Moussa Al-Taamari replacing Pierre-Yves Ngawa.
Vincent Kompany (Anderlecht) is making a first substitution, with Peter Zulj replacing Nany Dimata.
Oud-Heverlee make their second substitution with David Hubert replacing Kristiyan Malinov.
In the minute 84, Mathieu Maertens levels the score at 2-2.
Mustapha Bundu is replacing Yari Verschaeren for the home team.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Arthur Allemeersch is replacing Xavier Mercier for Oud-Heverlee at Lotto Park.
The home team replace Percy Tau with Michel Vlap.
